_header: Saint John the Gospeller says us / That til his disciples said
Note: For the version in the ‘expanded’ Cycle see 4648.
_description: Gospel for Whit Monday in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodAsh42.First Lines:
Saynte Ione þe gospellere saise vsþat to his dissipils
                    saide iesus…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…He dredes more mannes sightþan god þat seis all his
                    plightA gude tale here by lyesþat i will tell ȝou or i
                    ryse
BodAsh42.Editions:
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Seint Ion þe gospiler seiþ vsÞat to his disciples
                    seide Ihesus…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…He dredeþ more monnes sihtÞen God þat
                    seoþ al his synne riht
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BodEngPoetc3.First Lines:
Aeynt Iohn þe go[ ] says vsþat to þe apostlis [ ]
                    …
BodEngPoetc3.Last Lines:
…he dreds mar mans syghtþan god þat sees all his
                    plyght

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
SEynt Ione þe gospellere sais vsþat til his apostles
                    saide ihesus…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…ffor mans sight more dredes heþen he dos god þat al
                    may se
CULAdd8335.Attributed Title:
fferia iia ebdomade pentecoste secundum Iohannem (p.
                    216)

CULDd11.First Lines:
SEynt Iohn þe Gospellere seyth vsþat to his disciplis
                    seyde ihesusMi fader louiþ þis world so…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…he drediþ mor mennes sightÞan god þat
                    seeþ al his plight
CULDd11.Attributed Title:
Euangelium secundum Iohannem. Sic deus dilexit mundum vt filium suum
                        vnigenitum et cetera (f. 134v)

CULGg531.First Lines:
Sayne Iohn þe a gospeller says vsþat tyll hys disciples
                    sayd ihesus…
CULGg531.Last Lines:
…He dredys mare mannes syghtþan goddes þat sese all
                    hys plyght
CULGg531.Attributed Title:
þis es þe gospell of wytsonun monunday (f.
                    90v)

Saint Iohn þe gospeller says vsThat to his dissiples said
                    ihesus…
BLAdd38010.Last Lines:

                    rysse

MinULZ822.First Lines:
Saynt Ion þe gospellere says vsþat to hys apposteles sayd
                    Ihesusmy fader lufed þis warlde swa…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…he dredys mare mans syghtþan gode þat sees all hys
                    plyght
